name: VANGURU ANKIT REDDY

experience.description: Worked as summer intern at Samsung Research and Development Institute Banglore. Worked on developing a tool along with other group members.

projects.name: Food Delivery Database Management
projects.description: Created an ER Diagram and corresponding Relational model for delivery system and database for the project. It includes the relationship between Customers, Orders, Restaurants, Delivery boy etc. Database is normalized to reduce the data redundancy. Stored data using Oracle SQL Developer for real time application or queries.

projects.name: Code Organiser
projects.description: Designed a website to help users to locate their problems and the solutions instantly. Users can make connections and check each others answers.
